title: That midnight kiss
creator_credit: Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer, Joe Pasternak and Norman Taurog
brief_description: An opera singer (Kathryn Grayson) would like to have a tenor who looks the part of the tenor role. When Lanza, a singing truck driver is discovered, she gets her wish - and a happy ending isn’t far away. Cast also includes Jose Iturbi, Ethel Barrymore, Keenan Wynn, J. Carrol Naish, Thomas Gomez.
